triplets: Footwear designed to protect and cover the feet and ankles, often extending up the leg
Foot protection, fashion, outdoor activities, work safety, hiking, and weather protection
Leather, rubber, synthetic fabrics, textiles, and sometimes metal for protective components
Upper covering the foot and ankle
Laces or fasteners to secure the boot
Varies depending on style, material, and manufacturer; common colors include black, brown, tan, and gray
Fashion accessories, protective work gear, outdoor equipment, and winter clothing
Various manufacturers producing fashion, work, or sports boots
Approximately 0.5–1.5 kg per pair depending on material and style
Typically 20–40 cm depending on style (ankle, mid-calf, knee-high)
Typically 2–10 years depending on material quality, usage, and care
